tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A scaled, salamander-like tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. #IF(game.isSillyModeEnabled()) But wait, is that Ah- [style.italics(Aurora Borealis!?)] At this time of year, at this time of day, in this part of the country, [style.italics(localized entirely around the tip of your tail!?)]
[style.boldSalamanderFrost(Yes.)] #ELSE Strangely, a cold, arcane aura soon begins emanating from its tip. Thankfully, the small, swirling cloud of frost is revealed to be comfortably cool to the touch. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] complete control over [npc.her] new tail. #ENDIF
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldSalamanderFrost(frost-tipped salamander tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] scaled, salamander-like tails sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're each about [npc.tailLength] long. #IF(game.isSillyModeEnabled()) But wait, is that Ah- [style.italics(Aurora Borealis!?)] At this time of year, at this time of day, in this part of the country, [style.italics(localized entirely around the tips of your tails!?)]
[style.boldSalamanderFrost(Yes.)] #ELSE Strangely, a cold, arcane aura soon begins emanating from each tip. Thankfully, the small, swirling clouds of frost are revealed to be comfortably cool to the touch. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] complete control over [npc.her] new tails. #ENDIF
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldSalamanderFrost(frost-tipped salamander tails)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a prehensile #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] salamander tail, whose chilled tip is enveloped in a small, swirling cloud of frost. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] prehensile #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] salamander tails, whose chilled tips are enveloped in small, swirling clouds of frost. #ENDIF
